questions.text: Where are the four friends going at the beginning of the film?
What is the name of the leader of the gangsters?
questions.explanation:
Fallon.

	He is played by Denis Leary and is both terrific and terrifying at the same time.

questions.text: When the gangsters are looking for the four friends in the train yard, what is not one of the things that the leader of the gangsters yells out to them?
Which one of the friends is the most unathletic?
When Ray tries to negotiate with the gangsters, how much money does he offer them at first?
questions.explanation:
{$100,000}.

	When the leader doesn't accept this, Ray ups it to {$200,000} plus his ring as a deposit.

questions.text: Which one of the four friends has become a sensitive family man?
questions.explanation:
Frank.

	Frank is played by Emilio Estevez.

questions.text: When Mike persuades the others to fight back against the gangsters, how does he kill Sykes?
options: He hits him over the head with a pole
questions.explanation:
He shoots him.

	Mike shoots Sykes when they are in the sewers.

questions.text: How do the four friends get the attention of the authorities?
questions.correct: They break into a store and the security alarm goes off
options: They fire their gun repeatedly on the street
questions.explanation: They break into a store and the security alarm goes off.

questions.text: Who eventually faces Fallon and kills him?
How many of the friends are killed?
questions.explanation:
One.

	Ray is the only one that gets killed. He gets thrown off a building.
